function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air exchange rates in different zones of the house","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of ventilation systems, and adjusting airflow rates as per ventilation guidelines","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, air quality sensors, and automated airflow controllers","People":"Household members, occupants, and visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Positive reading of SF6 under clean air conditions and in cases of nonzero residual levels of SF6 in the house","Impact":"Inaccurate measurements of indoor air quality and ventilation performance","Mitigation":"Regular calibration of SF6 monitors, and subtraction of appropriate background levels from all readings","Technologies":"Calibration equipment, background level subtraction tools","People":"Maintenance personnel, environmental health professionals","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Relatively low standard errors for the calculated air change rates","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate assessment of indoor air quality and ventilation effectiveness","Mitigation":"Use of multiple measurement techniques, and verification of results through independent methods","Technologies":"Multiple air quality measurement devices, independent validation tools","People":"Indoor air quality experts, environmental health professionals","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
